DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacology ONO-4474 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: A Double-blind , Multi-centre , Single Dose , Single Multiple Ascending Dose , Four-part , Randomised , Placebo-controlled Study Healthy Adult Elderly Subjects Exploring Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics ONO-4474 Fed Fasted Conditions , Pharmacology ONO-4474 NGF-hyperalgesia .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male subject age 1855 year inclusive ( Parts A C ) ; healthy male female subject age 1855 year inclusive ( Part B ) ; healthy male female subject age 65 ( Part D ) 2 . Subjects body mass index 18.030.0 kg/m2 inclusive 1 . Subjects clinically relevant history presence clinically significant disease disorder 2 . Current smoker smoke used nicotine product within 6 month Screening visit
